mapper.sql: id, air_pax_id, order_no, air_order_no, dep_air_code, arr_air_code, is_inter, dep_date, arr_date, dep_time, arr_time, trip_index, seg_index, market_carrier, market_flight_no, oper_carrier, oper_flight_no, is_share, air_equip_type, cabin_code, cabin_level, sale_amt, pay_amt, tkt_amt, airport_tax, fule_tax, point_amt, coupon_amt, coupon_type, coupon_discount_amt, coupon_pay_unit, pay_currency, pay_type, fare_basis, tour_code, ei, ei_comment, rule_id, dep_terminal, arr_terminal, is_via, via_info, is_meal, is_asr, tkt_no, tkt_seg_status, status, pnr_no, is_history, rel_seg_id, shopping_type, change_pay_type, change_amt, upgrade_amt, change_tax_amt, change_count, gift_point, asr_result, meal_result, position, remark, is_valid, crt_dt, opt_dt, version_num, product_code
mapper.select: SELECT market_flight_no as flight ,COUNT(market_flight_no) as count , MAX(pay_amt)as max ,MIN(pay_amt) as min from air_pax_seg WHERE opt_dt BETWEEN #{start} and #{end} and market_flight_no LIKE concat("%", #{flight}, "%") and pay_amt>0 GROUP BY market_flight_no ORDER BY COUNT(flight) DESC

SELECT COUNT(a.flight) from (SELECT market_flight_no as flight , COUNT(market_flight_no) as count, MAX(pay_amt)as max , MIN(pay_amt) as min from air_pax_seg WHERE opt_dt BETWEEN #{start} and #{end} and market_flight_no LIKE concat("%", #{flight},"%") and pay_amt>0 GROUP BY market_flight_no ) as a

order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=CHAR},

change_pay_type = #{changePayType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
change_amt = #{changeAmt,jdbcType=DOUBLE},

change_count = #{changeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},

meal_result = #{mealResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

opt_dt = #{optDt,jdbcType=BIGINT},

product_code = #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
